body.name: ELIVED UL Listed Full Motion TV Monitor Wall Mount for Most 14-42 Inch LED LCD Flat Screen TVs & Monitors, Swivels Tilts Extension Rotation, Bracket Max VESA 200x200mm, up to 33 lbs.

features: TV Wall Mount Applicability - This TV mount fits most 14-42 inch LED/LCD TVs and monitors, with 33 lbs. MAX loading and VESA sizes from 75x75mm to 200x200mm. This wall mount TV bracket is designed for single wood stud or concrete/brick walls and compatible with TCL, SAMSUNG, LG, VIZIO, SONY, HISENSE, SCEPTRE, and other TV brands.

180º Rotation & Swivel Design - With the 180º rotation unique design, the full motion TV mount can easily display in landscape or portrait position to meet your special need. Also, this swivel TV mount can swivel TV 180º to cover any angles in your home for the ultimate viewing experience.

Adjustable for Max Flexibility - This TV wall mount bracket can tilt TV +3º/-10º to reduce glare, level +/-3º after installation for maximum viewing flexibility. The strong articulating arm provides a smooth 14.96" extension and 2.67" depth to the wall for saving space.

Universal Monitor Wall Mount - Our monitor mount fits monitors sizes 13, 17, 19, 20, 21 22, 24, 27, 32, 34, 35 inch with VESA patterns from 75x75mm to 200x200mm. This wall monitor mount can keep your monitor to eye level and mount your monitor at an ergonomic sitting position to reduce eyes train and neck pain while saving up much space on your desktop.

Easy Installation - The TV wall mount package comes with a completed hardware mounting kit, and the step-by-step instructions will guide you through the simple assembly and installation process. NOTE: DO NOT install into drywall alone. Concrete anchors will be sent per request. Any pre-purchase and installation questions, Our professional support team is available to answer you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Sturdy, easy to install for this Grandma.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install, works great
reviews.reviewText: Wall mount is very easy to install, comes with plenty of hardware. If you’re not familiar with mounting things to the wall i’d recommend getting help or having someone do for you. I mounted a 32” led tv to this wall mount. TV is pretty light. 10-15lbs tops but wall mount is very stable fully extended even and safe enough for my kids to move tv around to desired location. The tilt motion for the TV holds great but you may need to adjust the 2 screws to the right tension so the tv doesn’t flop downward. No complaints from me would definitely buy again. Compared to our local best buy it’s well under half the cost for a similar mount.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worked great on our 32"TV
reviews.reviewText: Found there to be more hardware included than I needed. The instructions are great and made the install go real smooth. The delivery from Amazon was fast and packaging was perfect. One of the best parts was the low price, the local big box store was moer than 4 times the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Worked well for a 32 inch tv
reviews.reviewText: Arrived on time and packaged well. The directions were workable but could have been more clear. The unit is rugged enough however I don't think I'd stress it with anything over a 32 inch tv. The overall articulation movements are smooth and the cost is very reasonable. The only reason I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 was that I felt the directions could have been better. Im happy with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome tv mount
reviews.reviewText: I used this tv mount on a 24" Vizio d-series. The bracket that mounts to the tv went on easy fit perfectly. I mounted the wall bracket in a stud with no issues. It literally took less than 5 minutes to mount everything. I really like that it swivels and I can put the tv against the wall when I'm not using it. I plan on switching the 24 to a 32" Vizio using the same mount.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars REVISED: New mount works GREAT!
reviews.reviewText: This wall mount is smaller than others that I have used, but OK for a 26" TV or smaller. However, the hardware is undersized to the point that it won't hold the TV at the correct angle. There is an adjustment for viewing angle that is locked in place with 2 very small screws. Unfortunately the weight of the TV makes the unit drop down, making the screen pointing way down. No amount of tightening the screws would keep it up at a normal viewing angle, so I had to jam some nuts in the mechanism to make it workable. I do not recommend this wall mount.REVISION: Apparently I ordered a TV arm that was too small for my TV, resulting in problems. With the help of the companies TERRIFIC CUSTOMER SERVICE, I received a larger arm, part number YD1015-A that was exactly what I needed to mount my TV. The new mount is HIGHLY RECOMMENDED as it worked perfectly to mount my heavy 26" TV. I am confident that it would hold a much larger TV, at least up to 43" or 50" depending on weight. Plus, it came with all of the hardware needed to mount it, including screws and a level! Just be sure to order the correct size for your application!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Nice & affordable does the job & made well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars small with a big feel
reviews.reviewText: I was startled to find the package in one of those white and blue Amazon bubbly envelopes, and even more shocked to find this tiny package inside that is supposed to be my monitor wall mounting bracket. My other wall mounting bracket for our larger TV is huge and weighs a ton so I was surprised to see this little thing, thinking no way is this going to work. Next came the removal of it from the box it was in. It was complete with everything necessary to get the job done, minus a drill and drill bit to secure the lag bolts into the wall. There are 3 different size screw/bolts for different sized holes that most TVs and monitors have in the back for just this purpose. Also, there are several sized rubbery washers/spacers in case the back is somewhat curved or rounded a bit, this will ensure a better tight fit, so that was a bonus. They tossed in a little wrench, cheap, but good for the 1 time use to secure the arms to the attachment part. The instructions are written easily enough so that anyone even remotely skilled in assembly can figure this out. Just look at the pieces for a minute to familiarize yourself, look at the instruction pictures and it should be fairly obvious how it all goes together. Overall, I am very happy with the entire thing from start to finish. It does exactly as it is stated, and the attached videos are good to watch as well, recommended for those who are not so mechanically inclined.
It was easy to install and holds the tv up great.
A perfect little mount kit for a small tv/monitor. Well packaged and excellent installation instructions. I would buy again.
Perfect for what I needed, Arrived quickly, nice small box but packs a punch. Easy install and was great that it even came with a mini leveler

reviews.reviewTitle: Would it be easy to fit and install
reviews.reviewText: Perfect fit and dream installation. Highly recommend
Super easy to install and pivots perfectly
